qas.question: What geologic period came after the Mesolithic period in India?
What happened in India during the Neolithic period?
How long ago did the last ice age happen in India?
When did settlements appear in Madhya Pradesh?
During what time span were there findings of habitation in India and Pakistan?

context: The Mesolithic period in the Indian subcontinent was followed by the <a0_0>Neolithic<a0_0/> period, when more <a1_0>extensive settlement<a1_0/> of the subcontinent occurred after the end of the last Ice Age approximately <a2_0>12,000 years<a2_0/> ago. The first confirmed semipermanent settlements appeared <a3_0>9,000 years ago<a3_0/> in the Bhimbetka rock shelters in modern Madhya Pradesh, India. Early Neolithic culture in South Asia is represented by the Bhirrana findings (7500 BCE) in Haryana, India & Mehrgarh findings (<a4_0>7000–9000 BCE<a4_0/>) in Balochistan, Pakistan.
